name: Strategy&
tagline: Former Booz & Company—pure strategy arm within Big 4
description: Strategy& became part of the PwC network in 2014, following the transformation from Booz & Company. Strategy, made real.
known_for: Prestigious strategy heritage from Booz & Company (founded 1914), acquired by PwC in 2014 in the largest consulting acquisition in PwC history. Known for capabilities-driven strategy approach and access to PwC's global network while maintaining strategy consulting focus.
career_path: Associate (2-3 yrs) → Senior Associate (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Director (2-3 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Resume Screen → First Round (2 case + fit/behavioral) → Final Round (2 case + fit/behavioral)
recruiting.unique: Group case exercise sometimes used for undergraduate internship applicants. Roughly half of interview time spent on case, half on behavioral/fit questions.
recruiting.timeline: Rolling basis (most opportunities), 4-6 weeks from application to decision, shorter timeline (2 weeks) for referrals

byu.tip: Apply through Strategy& portal specifically, not general PwC careers site—they have separate recruiting processes.
